article: transocean inc. , the world 's largest offshore drilling contractor , said monday it will combine with smaller competitor globalsantafe corp. , creating a company with a full range of offshore drilling services in the world 's key markets .
abstract: transocean globalsantafe plan to combine to create new oil drilling heavyweight
